original_text: The sick people asked Jesus for help. They wanted to touch only the edge of his coat. Every sick person who touched him became well again.
korean_text: 다만 예수의 옷자락에라도 손을 대게 하시기를 간구하니 손을 대는 자는 다 나음을 얻으니라

sentences.original_text: The sick people asked Jesus for help
They wanted to touch only the edge of his coat
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 겉옷 가장자리에만 닿고 싶어했습니다

sentences.original_text: Every sick person who touched him
